text: "Lost Without Your Love" is a 1976 song by Bread and is the title track to their sixth and final studio album Lost Without Your Love. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 8 in Canada, number 19 in Australia, number 27 in the United Kingdom and number 23 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Bread (band) songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Lost Without Your Love (song)
